biography: Toni, a member of Hirsala Golf, is one of the most accomplished players in the history of the Hector Trophée.  His consistent participation, including appearances in 2022, 2023, 2024, and 2025, speaks to his dedication to this prestigious tournament.

Toni's record speaks for itself; he's a three-time Hector Trophée champion, having secured the coveted title in Hector Trophée II, IV, and V. This remarkable feat underscores his exceptional skill in pairs competition and his ability to thrive under pressure.

Beyond his team successes, Toni has also proven himself a dominant individual player.  He's a two-time Victor trophy winner, taking home the hardware in 2021 and 2024. This individual recognition further highlights his mastery of the game and his consistent performance across various golfing challenges.
